situation: G became agitated and distracted during class because the fluorescent lights in the room were too bright and buzzing.
action: The teacher aide dimmed some of the lights and provided G with a desk lamp that had a softer, warmer light. They also allowed G to use noise-cancelling headphones to block out the noise.
effect: G was able to focus better and complete her tasks at a much improved rate with the adjusted lighting and reduced noise distractions.
